title: China and UK promoted free markets in 80s

content.prompt: During the 1980s, the governments of Great Britain and China did which of the following?

choices.label: Promoted free markets and private profit incentives

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
